::Prowl::

Prowl relaxes slightly as he hears Iron Raptor order the maximals to stop 
firing. He looks from Oblitertron to her as she walks closer to the alliance 
gestalt. If Oblitertron was mad, which he probably was, things could get 
ugly, like they ussually do.

Prowl flies toward Iron Raptor, reaching her in time to hear her send her 
message to the Oblitercons. His eyes widen. He was not going to lose her, 
even if it meant fighting Oblitertron one on one. That was rediculous, he 
realizes, landing next to Iron Raptor, a one on one between him and the 
gestalt would end in seconds, with him more that likely on the bottom of 
Oblitertron's foot.

Prowl's optics widen as he hears her take take responcibility for something 
the rest of the maximals have done. She was insane! He looks at her. She 
might be insane, but she was beatiful, event through all the damage she has 
sustained.

He looks at her, his optics full of love as he walks up to her.

"If you're going to get yourself slagged," he says, "I'm going to be here 
with you."

He stops near her. This was not just a useless gesture of love, it was a 
precaution. If Oblitertron decided to attack, Prowl could get himself and 
Iron Raptor out of there faster than she could have escaped herself.
